article_title: Mr. Coble Departs Washington, Pension Reform Dream Denied
article_text: You need to LOG IN to edit your watchlist.

article_metadata.description: A Congressman has given up a $2 million pension to honor his campaign pledge.
article_metadata.author: Jonathan Yates

og.description: North Carolina's Rep. Howard Coble wanted to reform the congressional pension system. After 30 years his efforts have gone nowhere. Now he's retiring.
og.title: Mr. Coble Departs Washington, Pension Reform Dream Denied

article_metadata.keywords: Rep. Coble, House of Representatives, Public Pension, Pension Reform, Congress, Insurance, Obamacare, Health Care, Jonathan Yates, TheStreet.com
